safety.title: Stay Safe!
safety.subtitle: Always meet in public places when returning items. Verify ownership before handing over valuables.
safety.tip1_desc: Meet in well-lit, high-traffic locations like police stations or malls.
safety.tip2_desc: Ask for detailed descriptions or photos not shared in the post.
safety.tip3_desc: Never go to a meeting alone if possible. Tell someone where you are going.
safety.tip4_desc: Use real-time location sharing with a trusted contact.
